attributes.action: Develop HALLS OF RESIDENCE for all MPs...Selling second homes and giving money  back to tax payers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If all these MPs are really in Politics to make a difference, then I see no problem with them living in Halls of residence whilst in London. Sell back the Massive homes they live in and put the money to some use. If this happens there will no longer be ridiculous costs for decorating etc....

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
